articles.title: A hard mistake to make: Pixel Emergency SOS accidentally shares someone's nudes - Android Authority
articles.description: Pixel phones have an Emergency SOS feature, and someone accidentally sent a nude video to contacts after unintentionally activating it.
articles.content:
• A Reddit user accidentally sent a nude video to contacts after inadvertently setting off the Emergency SOS feature on their Pixel phone.
